title: My Pixel 3a always display the phone name in the center. Is it hardware? How to fix?
content: My display always show a very pale "Google Pixel 3a" in the center of the screen. It's particularly visible on white screens. There is also a pink-ish tint on the whole screen instead of pure white like it's impregnated in the screen (like old TV that kept displaying something when it was exposed for a too long time. Tried factory reset, still there. Sounds like it might need replacement.
